bibl.title: Due documenti latini inediti dalle collezioni di Princeton e Duke (P.Princ. inv. Bell II 64, P. Duke. Inv. 528)
bibl.seg: 141.5 P. Duke Inv. 528 P. Princ. Inv. Bell II 64
Giulio Iovine, Due documenti latini inediti dalle collezioni di Princeton e Duke (P. Princ. inv. Bell II 64, P. Duke inv. 528).
bibl.note: PPrinc inv. Bell II 64 contains accounts in more than one column and features typically Roman measures (pedes, digiti, perhaps articuli). PDuke inv. 528, dated back to 17 December AD 149, is related to the legio X Fretensis and records a purchase of some sort in which not only soldiers and veterans, but women too might be involved.
